title: AWS Network Security to Azure Network Governance: Advanced Security, Compliance, and Governance
description: Master advanced network security by implementing comprehensive network protection, compliance frameworks, and governance with AWS security services and migrating to Azure equivalents with zero-trust networking, advanced threat protection, and automated compliance.
learningObjectives: Implement zero-trust network security architectures with advanced threat protection
Build comprehensive network compliance and regulatory framework automation
Create advanced network governance and policy automation systems
Design network threat detection and automated incident response workflows
Implement network forensics and security analytics platforms
Build network compliance auditing and continuous monitoring frameworks
prerequisites: Completion of all previous ANS-C01 labs (Design, Implementation, Management & Operations)
Strong understanding of network security principles and zero-trust architectures
Experience with compliance frameworks (PCI DSS, HIPAA, SOX, GDPR)
Familiarity with security monitoring and incident response procedures
businessScenario: CyberSecure Networks provides managed security services for highly regulated industries including financial services, healthcare, and government agencies. Their security team needs advanced network security capabilities including zero-trust architecture, automated compliance monitoring, threat detection, and incident response. They must master both AWS and Azure network security platforms to deliver comprehensive protection and regulatory compliance.

troubleshooting.issue: Complex security policy conflicts and performance impact in zero-trust environments
troubleshooting.solution: Implement policy hierarchy and precedence, use policy simulation and testing, implement performance monitoring, use policy optimization, and implement staged deployment

troubleshooting.issue: False positives and alert fatigue in advanced threat detection systems
troubleshooting.solution: Implement machine learning tuning, use threat intelligence correlation, implement context-aware alerting, use alert suppression and correlation, and implement feedback loops

troubleshooting.issue: Compliance audit failures and evidence collection challenges
troubleshooting.solution: Implement comprehensive audit logging, use automated evidence collection, implement compliance validation testing, use compliance dashboards, and implement continuous monitoring
